allow_requests_by_default.name: allow_requests_by_default
allow_requests_by_default.prompt: Would you like requests to be allowed by default? Yes/No

cf_associated.name: cf_associated
cf_associated.prompt: Will this WAF will be associated to a Cloudfront Distribution? Yes/No

associated_apigw_list.name: associated_apigw_list
associated_apigw_list.prompt: Enter a comma separated list of arns to associate this waf to. (Leave empty when associating waf to a Cf distro)

associated_alb_list.name: associated_alb_list
associated_alb_list.prompt: Enter a comma separated list of arns to associate this waf to. (Leave empty when associating waf to a Cf distro)
